author: ate
msg: Missed parent pom linkage within the archetype which caused maven deploy to break (on missing distributionManagement configuration)

author: ate
msg: Replacing security attribute index on both name and value by an index on name alone.
MySQL cannot handle indexes which key is more than 1000 bytes in total... so was breaking on this index definition.
The additional benefit of an index on both name and value probably wouldn't be very significant anyway.

author: djencks
msg: GERONIMO-4258 clean up some naming constant usage
